casebody.data:
NOONSAB
v.
STATE of NC 131P16-11 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2019 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Somchai Noonsab, Somchoi Noorsob, for Noonsab, Somchai.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of May 2019 by Defendant to Dismiss of Judicial Notice:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of June 2019."
